title: Server Side Rendering (SSR)
subtext: Rendering web pages on the server
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Server Side Rendering (SSR)
texts: Server-side rendering (SSR) is a method of rendering web pages on the server rather than in the clientâ€™s browser, improving performance and SEO.
SSR is often used in modern web development frameworks like Next.js to deliver faster page load times and better user experiences.
